title: 2020 Volkswagen Grand California 600 review: the ultimate luxury camper van – complete with shower and loo
text:
The #vanlife hashtag is home to just over six million photographs. It’s a millennial thing, really, and tends to involve young, beautiful people living ostensibly wholesome, nomadic lives in the back of their twee converted campers. Their aggressively curated, over-saturated social media feeds paint a picture of endless adventure, of pastel bunting, of whimsical, home-is-where-you-park-it freedom, and lots and lots of fairy lights.

There’s nothing hashtag vanlife about the Volkswagen Grand California, though. Designed and manufactured with characteristic Wolfsburg pragmatism, its interior is hewn from practical, wipe-clean materials and filled with no-nonsense user interfaces. The only concession...
description: The #vanlife hashtag is home to just over six million photographs.
